sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_slackerbot_parser"> <x_snc_slackerbot_parser action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <activation_example>!gu</activation_example> <active>true</active> <description>Gulash: cook up some Hungarian Notation</description> <emoji>:P</emoji> <flags>gi</flags> <order/> <regex>^(!gulash|!gu)</regex> <script><![CDATA[/* activation_example:!gulash regex:^(!gulash|!gu) flags:gi */ var strResponse = new x_snc_slackerbot.Gulash(current).parse() || ''; try{ new x_snc_slackerbot.Slacker().send_chat( current, strResponse, true ); } catch( e ){ gs.error( "An error occured when SlackerBot tried to send a response back to Slack.\nError: " + e.name + ": " + e.message ); } ]]></script> <stop_processing>false</stop_processing> <sys_created_by>w.geek6</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-08 21:42:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>163bee6f97da5110b29b7c80f053af80</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-19 23:28:34</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_slackerbot_parser> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Gulash: cook up some Hungarian Notation
